isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - FRONT AXLE LOCKING HUBS - INSTALL

step1.para: Install a new gasket and the hub assembly onto the wheel end with the eight 7/16-20 locknuts. Tighten to 50-60 ft-lbs. (68-81 N·m).
Secure the axle stop plug onto the end of the axle shaft with 7/16-20x1I Nylok capscrew. Draw the capscrew up tight, then back off one turn.

Place a new gasket on the clutch assembly. Align the holes in the clutch assembly with holes in the hub body and gasket. Push the clutch assembly into the hub body and secure with the six 1/4-20x1I Allen head capscrews. Tighten to 6 ft-lbs. (8 N·m).
